system.sustained:
The Psyker crushes a target's vital organs. Making Opposed Willpower test vs Target's Willpower. If Psyker succeeds, inflicts 1d10 + Psy Rating Rending Damage with Shocking quality. Power ignores non-warded armour and toughness bonus of target. Only works on living beings and animals, not Daemons, non-living, or other warp denizens.
Shocking: If Target takes any damage from attack, makes +0 Toughness Test, on failiure Target is stunned for a number of rounds equal to half the damage suffered. +10 to save per AP.
